skills.name: Arc Lash
skills.desc: ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>14%</text></br>Unleash arcing lightning that deals <text class='c_number'>[0.42 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage to enemies in front of you. Every <text class='c_number'>0.420</text> times <text class='c_important'>Arc Lash</text> swipes, it Stuns all enemies hit for <text class='c_number'>2</text> seconds.

skills.name: Frost Nova
skills.desc: if[AffixIsEquipped(SNO.Affix.legendary_sorc_017) ? 0 : 1]<text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>AffixIsEquipped(SNO.Affix.legendary_sorc_017) ? 0.25 : [24 * (cdr[sLevel]]</text> seconds</br>if[24 * (cdr[sLevel]]9<text class='c_label'>Charges:</text> <text class='c_resource'>2</text></br><text class='c_label'>Charge Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>AffixIsEquipped(SNO.Affix.legendary_sorc_017) ? [[24 * (cdr[sLevel]] * (1+[Affix_Value_1#legendary_sorc_017])] : 0</text> seconds</br>Unleash a torrent of frost, <text class='c_important'><u>Freezing</u></text> enemies around you for <text class='c_number'>[24 * (cdr[sLevel]]1</text> seconds.

skills.name: Ice Armor
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>20</text> seconds</br>A <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> of ice forms around you for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds, absorbing <text class='c_number'>[[(0.3 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))) * (1+[Bonus_Ice_Armor_Shield_Percent])]*100]%</text> of your Base Life <text class='c_number'>([(0.3 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))) * (1+[Bonus_Ice_Armor_Shield_Percent])])</text> in damage. While <text class='c_important'>Ice Armor</text> is active, <text class='c_number'>5%</text> of your damage dealt is added to its <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text>.

skills.name: Flame Shield
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>20</text> seconds</br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>35%</text></br>Engulf yourself in flames for <text class='c_number'>[Max(2.0,1.9 + (.1*sLevel))]</text> seconds, Burning surrounding enemies for <text class='c_number'>[0.4 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage per second.</br></br>While <text class='c_important'>Flame Shield</text> is active, you are <text class='c_important'><u>Immune</u></text>.

skills.name: Unstable Currents
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown: </text><text class='c_resource'>70</text> seconds</br>Lightning surges within you for <text class='c_number'>10</text> seconds. Whenever you cast a <text class='c_important'>Shock</text> Skill, a random <text class='c_important'>Core</text>, <text class='c_important'>Conjuration</text>, or <text class='c_important'>Mastery</text> <text class='c_important'>Shock</text> Skill is also cast.

skills.name: Teleport
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown: </text><text class='c_resource'>0 ? 0 : [11 * (cdr[sLevel]]</text> seconds</br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>[[11 * (cdr[sLevel]]4]%</text></br>Transform into lightning, becoming <text class='c_important'><u>Unstoppable</u></text> and surging to the target location, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.25 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage around you upon arrival.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Gloves
added_affixes: You deal <text class='c_random'>51.33%</text> more damage to Immobilized, Stunned, or <text class='c_important'><u>Frozen</u></text> enemies.

equipment.name: Archon Faulds
base_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>0.72%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>43.08%</text>.

equipment.name: Band
strikethrough_affixes: You deal <text class='c_random'>43.8%</text> increased damage to <text class='c_important'><u>Vulnerable</u></text> enemies while you have a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text>.
added_affixes: While <text class='c_important'>Unstable Currents</text> is not active, your <text class='c_important'>Shock</text> Skills have a <text class='c_random'>12.09%</text> chance to trigger a free cast from it.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Helm
base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills grant <text class='c_number'>30%</text> Damage Reduction for <text class='c_random'>8.7</text> seconds.
added_affixes: +5.85% Lucky Hit Chance while You Have a Barrier

equipment.name: Nimble Staff
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills gain <text class='c_random'>42.68%</text> Attack Speed.

equipment.name: Esu's Heirloom
base_affixes: Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by <text class='c_random'>38.68%</text> of your Movement Speed bonus.
+34.5% Movement Speed for VALUE2 Seconds After Killing an Elite

equipment.name: Boneweave Armor
base_affixes: 11.04% Damage Reduction from Enemies That Are Burning
strikethrough_affixes: You have <text class='c_number'>30%</text> increased Crowd Control Duration. While enemies are <text class='c_important'><u>Unstoppable</u></text>, you deal <text class='c_random'>46.13%</text> increased damage to them.
added_affixes: Damaging an Elite enemy grants you a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> absorbing up to <text class='c_random'>2.12</text> damage for <text class='c_number'>15</text> seconds. This effect can only happen once every <text class='c_number'>45</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Amulet
strikethrough_affixes: You take <text class='c_random'>32.67%</text> less damage from Crowd Controlled or <text class='c_important'><u>Vulnerable</u></text> enemies.
added_affixes: Deal <text class='c_random'>29.49%</text> increased damage while you have a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> active.

equipment.name: Ring
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Ice Shards</text> pierce <text class='c_random'>6</text> times, dealing <text class='c_random'>36.82%</text> less damage per subsequent enemy hit.
added_affixes: Skills deal up to <text class='c_random'>28.78%</text> increased damage based on your available Primary Resource when cast, receiving the maximum benefit while you have full Primary Resource.
